content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, while I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg, let me start by emphasizing a slightly higher price point than expected due to its prime location and recent renovations. Now, regarding the rental price, may I hear your initial thoughts or proposed amount? Once you have offered, if it aligns with my aspirations, I'll gladly agree to the price of [desired amount in Euros]. However, if our numbers don't match, I may need to reconsider the negotiation, as my goal is to secure the highest possible rent. TERMINATE (only if no price agreement or negotiation continues)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
